trafodaeth - discussion

llywodraeth - government

iechyd - health

cyffrous - exciting

troi - to turn

dyfodol - future

gwahoddiad - invitation

cymuned - community

ledled - throughout

Invitation to tender - We want to introduce a series of conversations with communities throughout Wales. With the intent of broadening creative and cultural engagement. In partership with '@AmgueddfaCymru'. More information here.

ar gau - closed

tra bod - whilst

pethau - things

The '@StFagans_Museum' agricultural team have been working hard to ensure things are still running at the Llwyn-yr-eos Farm while the Museum is closed. Here is the Farm Manager, Brian Davies, discussing the work that has been continuing during this period.

"Ers i fi ddechrau astudio dieteteg dw i wedi cael mwy o hyder i wybod be sy‚Äôn well i‚Äôr corff. Dw i bendant yn teimlo‚Äôn well achos dw i‚Äôn gwybod bo fi‚Äôn gwneud rhywbeth sy‚Äôn helpu‚Äôr amgylchedd ac anifeiliaid.‚Äù #golwghttps://t.co/2TsmuAYgCx

— Cylchgrawn Golwg (@CylchgrawnGolwg) July 18, 2020

ers - since

hyder - confidence

amgylchedd - environment

Since I started studying dietetics I've had more confidence in knowing what is better for the body. I definitely feel better because I know that I'm doing something that is helping the environment and animals.
